gameworld

Class AccessibleTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.Tile
      • gameworld.AccessibleTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Portal

    public class AccessibleTile
extends Tile
    This class represents a tile within a Room that a player can move onto or an item/challenge can be located.
    Author:
    Latrell Whata 300417220
